message: One of the many petty things I saw over and over in Utah. Neighbors who don't like you being able to make your life a living hell, because the only time those ordinances are really enforced is when a neighbor makes it their business....I'm willing to bet money that is what happened...self righteous ignorant neighbors who are worried about their poetry value lol....and not the fact that you have an awesome dad doing something really cool for his kids!

Moderate economic sensitive republicans want someone sane in the Whitehouse. Trump is a babbling demented authoritarian demagogue. Split your ticket if you must an axis two narcissistic personality with damage to the frontal lobe executive function of the brain isn't what this country can afford right now. Trump is a decade from diapers and yelling at ducks at the park. In your guts you know he's nuts
Seriously?

Oh wow Dawn, so sorry to hear this. Losing a love one to gun violence is something you never get over. I could not imagine what I would do had this happened to any of my siblings, children, and grandkids. Praying for you and your family's peace of mind.

Shame...shame ..shame....kids are dying of starvation, they should be given free lunches period, we pay enough in taxes....shame on this school district or whoever is involved..This woman should be commended
